channel.title: Linux on Code Koala
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Code Koala

item.title: Linux Snippet: File Permissions & Ownership
item.description: Users familiar with Linux based operating systems should have at least once come across issues related to Permission denied when executing some commands in the terminal. This article aims to shed some light on user permissions and ownership related to files and directories. In order to get an introduction to permissions and ownership, in the terminal, navigate to a location where files resides and execute ls -al to list files and directories with all associated details.

item.title: NodeJS Architecture & Concurrency Model
item.description: Hope y’all are familiar with basics of node.js and how its a popular choice for making server applications. This article aims to shed some light on node.js architecture and how it works internally. JavaScript on browser and JavaScript Runtimes JavaScript language is popularly used for web pages and to make them interactive. Thereby javascript code is required to be interpreted by browsers to show as web pages, and this is done by JavaScript Engine.
